title: 记者抗议下，香港公安取消新闻发布会
contents:
HK police suspended daily presser within the first minute as photojournalists used full power flash lights to stage a protest. Reporters from Ming Pao, RTHK, StandNews, AM730, Initium and InMedia were asked to leave after they refused to remove their helmets. 

由于摄影记者使用全功率闪光灯发起抗议活动，香港警方在第一时间暂停了每日新闻发布会。来自明报，香港电台，立场新闻，AM730，端传媒和香港独立媒体的记者在拒绝摘下头盔后被要求离开。

https://t.co/1ZzZlxotIV

The six helmets form the line 查警暴止警謊 investigate police brutality stop police lies. SSP Ko Chun-pong accused the reporters of hindering other media and violating public right to useful info from police. He threatened to cancel the presser If the reporters refused to leave.

六只头盔排成一行标语：查明警察暴行，制止警察谎言。最高警务总监高振邦指责记者阻碍其他媒体，侵犯了警察获取有用信息的公共权利。如果记者拒绝离开，他威胁要取消记者会。

23 minutes into the presser, police cancelled it while calling protesting reporters unprofessional and irresponsible. They turned off the lights in the room when they left.

进入新闻发布会23分钟后，警察取消了它，并称抗议记者不专业且不负责任。他们离开时关掉了房间的灯。
